about_the_game:
Purchase the Tank Quest OST for access to the game's full soundtrack, at high definition. This soundtrack is composed by David Eshuis.

The Tank Quest soundtrack includes original tracks for each level in the game, as well as some menu and trailer tracks. The genre is quite experimental and each track gives a unique feeling as they fit the various different environments throughout the world. There are 14 tracks in the album and they follow the game in order starting from the first trailer music, to the menu music, and then from the first in-game level to the last one. Most of the tracks are quite high energy, and make for a good listen when you need to get amped up. There are many different instruments used for each song, but a main theme is the use of a strong beat with deep bass. The whole album lasts for a total of 40 minutes of play time.

name: Tank Quest (Original Soundtrack)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 95 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 405 MB available space

short_description: This is additional content for Tank Quest, but does not include the base game.
